text: Kanwalpreet Singh (born 28 December 1981) is a former Indian field hockey player who played as a defender for the national team. He represented India at the 2006 Men's Hockey World Cup, 2006 Asian Games and 2006 Commonwealth Games. He works for the Punjab Police. ==References== ==External links== *Player profile at bharatiyahockey.org Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Field hockey players from Jalandhar Category:Indian male field hockey players Category:Male field hockey defenders Category:2002 Men's Hockey World Cup players Category:2006 Men's Hockey World Cup players Category:Field hockey players at the 2006 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for India
title: Kanwalpreet Singh
